body_html:
I think this is a case where you'd want to use tf.config.stateless random samplers. We may want to add that to the map* docstrings. +Derek Murray <mrry@google.com> wdyt? Is this a bug or should we be able to guarantee e.g. number of times that a map fn is called and the state of the rng seed across the multiple calls?
…

body:
I think this is a case where you'd want to use tf.config.stateless random
samplers. We may want to add that to the map* docstrings.  +Derek Murray
<mrry@google.com> wdyt?  Is this a bug or should we be able to guarantee
e.g. number of times that a map fn is called and the state of the rng seed
across the multiple calls?

On Sat, Jul 28, 2018, 11:49 AM Alfred Sorten Wolf <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> contributions. Otherwise, remove the contributions welcome label. Thank
